title: The Writer's Almanac -  Sunday, December 15, 2019
description: Today is the birthday of Irish author Edna O'Brien (1930). Six of her novels were banned in Catholic Ireland for content about the sex lives and subjugation of women.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of Irish author Edna O'Brien (1930). Six of her novels were banned in Catholic Ireland for content about the sex lives and subjugation of women.
